I am known for perfectionism and always strive for the best result
I am sensitive to mistakes and flaws and quickly notice them
I have a strong sense of responsibility and believe things should be done correctly
I often criticize myself for mistakes and have high expectations of myself
I value principles, rules and doing things right highly
I find it hard to rest because I always think there's something that needs to be done
I value justice and fairness greatly and get upset by injustice
